duties_responsibilities.duty: Work closely with candidates, recruiters, and internal stakeholders to schedule and confirm interviews, both virtual and face-to-face.
Communicate clearly and promptly about schedules and changes as needed.
Manage interview processes in the Applicant Tracking System.
Organize travel for candidates and reserve conference rooms as necessary.
Assist applicants during their onsite interviews.
Perform administrative support functions for the Recruiting team.
